original_text: and in the place where the boil was, a white swelling or reddish-white spot appears, they must present themselves to the priest.
korean_text: 그 종처에 흰 점이 돋거나 희고 불그스름한 색점이 생겼으면 제사장에게 보일 것이요

sentences.original_text: and in the place where the boil was
a white swelling or reddish-white spot appears
sentences.korean_translation: 흰 부기나 붉은빛 흰 반점이 나타나면

sentences.original_text: they must present themselves to the priest
